publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3229.1 David Mundell: Railways in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3229) in the name of Mr Kenny MacAskill, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "expresses its concern that the Scottish Executive is presenting the renewal of the ScotRail franchise as a panacea for all the difficulties faced by Scotland's railways while offering no guarantees that it can deliver a new franchise within the specified timetable and calls on the Scottish Executive to focus on the immediate priorities for the development of Scotland's railways and as a first step to bring forward the detail of its financial contribution to the redevelopment of Waverley Station."
